metadata.title: CVE-2018-8962 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In libming 0.4.8, the decompileSingleArgBuiltInFunctionCall function ofdecompile.c has a use-after-free. Remote attackers could leverage thisvulnerability to cause a denial of service via a crafted swf file.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
